apps.name: ELAND
apps.description: Solexa/Illumina short read aligner (max 32 bps aligned)

apps.name: bowtieIndex
apps.description: Run bowtie-build to convert FASTA files into *ebwt indexed files

apps.name: eland2ace
apps.description: Convert Eland output sorted.txt file into an .ace file

apps.name: elandHeader
apps.description: Convert incorrect header formats to the simple header format accepted by ELAND and other aligners matching this regex

apps.name: elandIndex
apps.description: Convert FASTA files into squashed/indexed ELAND reference files
Run maq-build to convert FASTA files into *.bfa binary indexed files
apps.name: maqIndex
novoIndex
apps.description: Run novoindex to convert FASTA files into binary indexed files

apps.name: TOPHAT
apps.description: A wrapper script to run TOPHAT (which uses Bowtie) to do fast short read alignment against a reference sequence
apps.notes: Uses Tophat v 0.1.12 and Bowtie v 0.12.2

apps.name: image2eland
apps.description: Process images into base calls with Bustard and align reads against reference sequence with Eland

apps.name: MAQ
apps.description: Align to reference and predict SNPs.

apps.name: SAV
apps.description: SNP Annotation and Verification
apps.notes: Call SNPs in pileup format from .SAM or .BAM file generated for each chromosome of the target species (DEFAULT: human hg19) and compare with dbSNP (DEFAULT: dbsnp130)

apps.name: filterSNP
apps.description: Filter SNPs by quality, coverage, etc.
Run test.pl to sleep and print to stdout file
apps.name: sleep

apps.description: Print a user-defined number of lines from one file to another file
apps.name: chopfile
createRefDirs
apps.description: Create reference file sub-directories, one for each chromosome sequence file in the input directory. Each sub-directory contains a linked copy of the corresponding chromosome sequence file in the input directory.
Download FTP files or web pages from a URL
apps.name: FTP
apps.notes: Download all files found in links in a page or raw text file

apps.description: Convert .ace file into multiple ace files
apps.name: replaceString
splitace
apps.description: Convert a single .ace file into multiple ace files, one for each contig.
Unzip or gunzip files, with an optional filter
apps.name: unzipFiles

apps.description: Generate JBrowse features for all chromosomes in parallel
apps.name: jbrowseFeatures

parameters.description: Paired read analysis parameters to pass to pickBestPair. Default: "--circular" (treats all chromosomes as circular).

The  mean inner distance between first read and its mate pair (corresponds to -r/--mate-inner-dist argument to Tophat)

parameters.description: A list of read alignments in SAM format. SAM is a compact short read alignment format that is increasingly being adopted.

parameters.name: jobs
parameters.description: Max. number of concurrent cluster jobs (DEFAULT = 30)

A UCSC BED track of junctions reported by TopHat. Each junction consists of two connected BED blocks, where each block is as long as the maximal overhang of any read spanning the junction. The score is the number of alignments spanning the junction.
parameters.name: junctions
keep
parameters.description: Keep intermediate files
